scripts.install: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.dev: npm run backend & npm run frontend
scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm start --prefix backend
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run cluster --prefix backend
scripts.test: npm test --prefix backend && npm test --prefix frontend
